name: grimoire
description: AI イラストを管理するツール

scripts.electron:debug: concurrently "npm run vite:electron-dev -w viewer" "npm run app:debug -w electron"
scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "npm run vite:electron-dev -w viewer" "npm run app:dev -w electron"
scripts.electron:build: npm run vite:electron-build -w viewer && npm run app:build -w electron
scripts.electron:build-win: npm run vite:electron-build -w viewer && npm run app:build-win -w electron

author: i_shinya
